example.parse: (PRT (RC_PART ف)) (PP-PRD (PREP علي) (NP (PRON_3MP هم))) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MP+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:MP_MOOD:SJ يعرفوا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-3 (DEM_PRON_MS هذا)) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يكون) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC ممكناً)))))))) (PUNC ")))))
